descript.abstract: Peru Transportation Census Data, 2017 is a polygon theme representing Districts (3rd level administrative units) in Peru as of 2017. Attribute data include summary results of the 2017 Peru census questions regarding transportation characteristics. The documentation of these variables can be found in the "Social" section from the accompanying code book. This dataset is part of Peru 2017 Census collection.

enttyp.enttypd: File Geodatabase representing census sectors and associated attribute tables.
